attributes.action: make the Police do their job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police force of this country is becoming ineffectual and unfit for purpose.  Their increasing inability or refusal to carry out their sworn duty to protect life and property by not even attending reported crimes and incidents is a clear neglect of duty, an offence under Police discipline regulations. Why are these regulations not enforced.
